item.title: Second
item.description: Front Matter Hugo allows you to add front matter in yaml, toml, or json to your content files. Front matter allows you to keep metadata attached to an instance of a content type—i.e., embedded inside a content file—and is one of the many features that gives Hugo its strength. Front Matter Formats Hugo supports four formats for front matter, each with their own identifying tokens. TOML identified by opening and closing +++.
